Dimensional Merchant: Hello!.%% *Welcome to Vitamin Service*. With the help of Vitamin Service, we try to beautify the lives of our users. Take a pack of Vitamins, you have chosen. If your inventory is full, it will be impossible to obtain Vitamins. Nor can they change, move, sell and throw. We hope you enjoy spending time with Vitamin Service!
